channel.title: When I use client it stops on Connecting to update server!
channel.description: I have RS4ever client and the Phoenixscape client which allows you to enter your own ip address. I had to change the build.bat to my version of data for the client to even pop up. Now when it loads it just gets stuck on Connecting to update server and flickers white for a little bit. Then on the little black screen where it pops up and goes with the client it says error_js5_connect Please help! Will someone please help me on teamviewer?

item.title: When I use client it stops on Connecting to update server!
item.dc:creator: @x_vain_x x vain x
item.description:
@x_vain_x wrote:

hmmm if it is like a fubergen client then its a problem with the client if its like a 508 ip changer client means the server is offline

Read full topic
